thread.title: Sasse: Anyone concerned about the consolidation of executive branch’s power should support Judge Gorsuch
thread.title_full: Sasse: Anyone concerned about the consolidation of executive branch’s power should support Judge Gorsuch

author: Nancy French
title: Sasse: Anyone concerned about the consolidation of executive branch’s power should support Judge Gorsuch
text:
Embed from Getty Images 
Sen. Ben Sasse, of Nevada, gave a great interview about President Donald Trump’s Supreme Court nominee Colorado federal Appeals Court Judge Neil Gorsuch. In it, he addresses the way that Democrats and Republicans treat each other like they’re involved in a Middle Eastern blood feud, about how all Americans should support Gorsuch, and then he moves seamlessly to Beyonce’s pregnancy. Yep. He did. 
This interview is why you have to love Ben Sasse. Listen for yourself:
